name: David Rick
description:
I have been a single man for some years now and have come to realize that life is so bored and lonely being alone. I am willing to take my relationship very serious and to the next level but just wish I could find my soulmate, someone to love, cherish and adore all the days of my life.
I am looking for someone who is open and sincere that is ready for a long term relationship. She should be friendly, caring, loving with good sense of humor.
